title: Duty Refund for EU Shippers – Recover Customs Duties
description: Specialized solutions for European shippers to reclaim international duties on returned merchandise. Ensure compliance with EU regulations and optimize your bottom line with TDR’s expert support.
main-heading: End-to-End Duty Refund Solution for EU Shippers
sub-heading: Unlock hidden savings in your international eCommerce supply chain with our specialized duty and tax recovery services.
solution-heading: A Solution For Each Customs Duty Spend
step1-description: The order has left the warehouse to its international buyer.
step2-description: The order was delivered to its US or UK buyer. One or more items are returned.
step2-cta-prefix: Claim back US and UK duties with our innovative
step3-description: The order is now back to the EU, ready to be processed at the returns warehouse.
step3-cta: will get your goods back home at 0% Duties.
discovery-heading: Discover What's In It For EU Shippers
